anya-e0105n30:1: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniṁ nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ pana ācariyo sumaṅgalapariveṇavāsinā dāṭhānāgattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṁ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:6: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:7: Papañcasūdaniṁ nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ bhadantabuddhamittattherena pubbe mayūradūtapaṭṭane attanā saddhiṁ vasantena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṁ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:12: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:13: Sāratthappakāsiniṁ nāma saṁyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ bhadantajotipālattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṁ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:17: Yaṁ samadhigataṁ puññaṁ, tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū”ti saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:18_1: kañcipurādīsu ca sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāramhi ca attanā saddhiṁ vasantena āyācito, tathā
anya-e0105n30:18_2: jīvakenāpi upāsakena piṭakattayapāragubhūtena vātāhatepi aniñjamānasabhāve dume viya
anya-e0105n30:18_3: aniñjamānasaddhamme ṭhitena sumatinā parisuddhājīvenābhiyācito akāsi. Vuttaṁ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:29: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā;
anya-e0105n30:31: Sabbāgamasaṁvaṇṇana, manoratho pūrito ca me yasmā;
anya-e0105n30:32: Etāya manoratha pūraṇīti nāmaṁ tato assā”ti a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.11.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:33_0: Imā ca pana catasso āgamaṭṭhakathāyo kurumāno ācariyabuddhaghoso mahāmahindattherenābhataṁ
anya-e0105n30:40: “Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca;
anya-e0105n30:41: “Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṁ, ādāya mayā imaṁ karontenā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n30:42_0: Imāsaṁ sarīrabhūtapāṭhesu ca samantapāsādikāyaṁ viya “mahāpaccariyaṁ, kurundiya”ntiādinā
anya-e0105n30:42_1: vinicchayasaṁvaṇṇanābhedappakāsanaṁ na dissati, tathā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsupi. Tenetaṁ
anya-e0105n30:42_2: ñāyati “suttantābhidhammesu mahāaṭṭhakathāto aññā mahāpaccariādināmikā porāṇikā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n30:42_3: ceva andhakaṭṭhakathā ca natthī”ti. Yāva vasabharājakālā (609-653) pana pākaṭānaṁ
anya-e0105n30:42_4: sīhaḷikattherānaṁ vinicchayo ca vādā ca vatthūni ca etāsupi dissantiyevāti.
